title: James Patterson: Meet the Author
description: Acclaimed suspense writer James Patterson stops by the Apple Store, SoHo in New York City for a discussion of his latest book, some of his most memorable characters, and his life as a writer of popular fiction.
itunes:subtitle: James Patterson discusses his most memorable characters.
